attributes.action: have cricket in Free to air tv
attributes.additional_details: as england will soon be world number 1. at least 1 match of cricket involved should be shown in free to air tv. so youngster can see the game and be intrested in the game, play the game and hopefully play for england. cricket is the only sport where no live action involving england is free to air with all live cricket shown in sky sports. the goverment should make an agreement where at least couple matches have to be shown in free to air. also cricket is england national sport and it is not even shown in free to air.
